abstract: Some OS X versions of the popular business suite need a little extra help to be updated properly.
snippet: Some OS X versions of the popular business suite need a little extra help to be updated properly.
lead_paragraph: Q. When there is an update to my Office for Mac, the installer is never able to close Sync Services and Microsoft Office Daemon. Clicking the Close Applications button never works, and even when I go into Activity Monitor and try to close the apps, I have to try several times before I can install the update. Is there something else I can try?

headline.main: Fixing Microsoft Office for Mac Update Errors
